name: TWIN LOUPS RECLAMATION DISTRICT
description: Twin Loups Reclamation District is an irrigation district that provides water to farmers.
sampleDescriptions: Title transfer of Twin Loups Reclamation District from the ownership of the Bureau Reclamation to the irrigation district.
